title: Technical Mentor
overview: Mentoring underrepresented students in computer science through weekly 1:1 sessions.

details.description: Provide guidance on algorithms, system design, career development, and interview preparation. Help students build projects and prepare for technical interviews.
details.impact: Mentored 25+ students, helped 18 secure internships at top tech companies, and contributed to 40% improvement in technical interview success rate among mentees.

title: Workshop Instructor
overview: Teaching web development and programming fundamentals to high school students.

details.description: Designed and delivered 8-week curriculum covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. Organized hackathons and project showcases.
details.impact: Taught 100+ students, 60% continued to pursue computer science in college, and created lasting impact on diversity in tech.
